title: Let's Create Some Ethereum Clones - Technical Guide and Token Ecosystems
author: Tokenista

core_concept.description: Comprehensive guide for forking Ethereum blockchain and deploying smart contracts for regional, corporate, or educational purposes
core_concept.philosophy: Creating clones is a relatively simple process that can democratize blockchain technology

blockchain_infrastructure.purpose: Setting up private or public Ethereum blockchain

eip_1167.name: Minimal Proxy Contract
eip_1167.purpose: Clone existing smart contracts cheaply using lightweight proxy
eip_1167.benefit: Reduces deployment costs by avoiding full code redeployment

youstocks_platform.description: Platform letting users launch their own tokens and trade across Ethereum-based platforms

regional_corporate_coins.use_case: Local businesses (bakery giving cookies for coins) or cities creating localized value

cross_pollination_strategy.philosophy: Different Ethereum forks (Expanse, EtherZero, Soil) should be viewed as 'pools of new users'
cross_pollination_strategy.mechanism: Create tokens on various chains to drive capital back to central exchange or community

minds.description: Platform with ERC-20 token rewarding users
minds.significance: Large user base of 'non-coiners' earning tokens without understanding blockchain

design_asset_creation.purpose: Create visual assets (logos, UI, marketing materials) for new coins and dApps

untapped_audience.description: Minds has large user base of 'non-coiners' earning tokens without understanding blockchain

opportunity.strategy: Clone tokens and take them to platforms like Minds
opportunity.mechanism: Trade new tokens for Minds tokens to bootstrap value
opportunity.result: Create 'big token ecosystem' involving people previously outside crypto space

diversifying_meaningless_coins.critique: Current coin names like 'Bitcoin' or 'Ethereum' are abstract and meaningless to average person

local_niche_argument.granularity: Coins for specific college towns or neighborhoods
local_niche_argument.marketing: Use billboards and flyers to bypass traditional Bitcointalk community

graphene_steemit_forks.purpose: Alternative to Ethereum for high-performance social applications

architecture.witness_node: Command-line tool for running blockchain node
architecture.cli_wallet: Initialize new chain ID and manage assets

bitshares_uias.name: User Issued Assets
bitshares_uias.governance: Run by voted nodes rather than central company

steemit_dpos.name: Delegated Proof of Stake
steemit_dpos.limitation: Steemit limited by being Reddit clone
steemit_dpos.suggestion: YouTube Graphene clone (video-based) would be far more successful

graphene_clone_workflow.step_1_obtain_source: Clone graphene and graphene-ui repositories from GitHub
graphene_clone_workflow.step_2_initialize_node: Run witness_node with specific RPC endpoint to start producing blocks
graphene_clone_workflow.step_3_genesis_customization: Modify genesis.json to define initial supply, block interval, and initial witnesses
graphene_clone_workflow.step_4_connect_wallet: Use cli_wallet to connect to node and set password to begin issuing UIAs

cloning_resources_library.bitcoin_clones: Guides on generating genesis blocks and forking original Bitcoin 0.8.x code

automated_tools.build_a_coin: Create coin via web interface (free or paid)

cloning_resources_library.in_wallet_creators: Projects allowing coin generation directly from wallet UI

project_directory_cross_pollination.philosophy: Abundance of Ethereum clones is pool for 'cross-pollination' not 'dilution'

infrastructure_tools.solidity_resources: Copy-paste successful smart contracts (Augur, CryptoKitties) onto EtherZero, Expanse, or Aura

market_strategy.technique: Create token on competitor's chain (Ethereum), give away to those who post about preferred chain (Aura)
market_strategy.purpose: Siphon users from larger ecosystems into smaller ones

prospectors_case_study.description: First game where in-game gold is real, tradable cryptocurrency (PGL)

layer_1.description: PGL traded against Bitcoin/EOS/WAX, then traded for USD

layer_2.name: In-Game Cartel
layer_2.mechanism: Control resources like stone or wood within game to influence PGL price on external exchanges

in_game_speculation.strategy: Holding in-game products (bricks, wagons) more profitable than holding currency
in_game_speculation.reason: New 'citizens' (players) enter game and increase demand for infrastructure

ecosystem_goal.flow: Earn PGL in Prospectors -> Buy Minds tokens -> Promote content -> Drive users back to game

blockchain_voting.proposal: Decentralized voting system where voters receive '1 Vote Coin' as proof of participation

social_utility_tokens.virtual_reality_gold: Tokens for VR worlds where users mine or provide services

outreach_recruitment.strategy: Encourage community to 'harass' traditional gaming giants via Twitter
outreach_recruitment.goal: Show them Prospectors model to force mainstream gaming onto blockchain

key_technical_resources.eip_1167_minimal_proxy: Cheap, industrial-scale cloning of smart contracts
key_technical_resources.remix_metamask: Primary tools for coding and deploying tokens on alternate Ethereum chains
key_technical_resources.tokenlab_expanse: Simplified app for creating tokens without deep coding knowledge

prospectors_referral.strategy: Use Google Ads to drive traffic to referral links

concepts_connected: Gaming economies as DeFi entry points

key_insights.democratization: Ethereum cloning democratizes blockchain technology for non-technical users
key_insights.cross_pollination: Different chains should be viewed as user pools, not competitors
key_insights.local_tokens: Regional/niche coins attract people who find 'Bitcoin' meaningless
key_insights.gaming_gateway: Blockchain games like Prospectors introduce 'non-coiners' to crypto economics
